	name="STATE_252"

	history={
		owner = ROC
		add_core_of = ROC
		set_variable = { division_limit_infrastructure_weight = 5 } # 5 because theres not much around here
		victory_points = { 353 5 }	# Hongqi
		
		set_variable = { state_religion_buddhism = 0.05 }
		set_variable = { state_religion_shinto = 0 }
		set_variable = { state_religion_christianity = 0.05 }
		set_variable = { state_religion_taoism = 0.3 }
		set_variable = { state_religion_confucianism = 0.5 }
		set_variable = { state_religion_secularism = 0.1 }
		set_variable = { state_religion_cthulhu = 0 }
	}

	provinces={
		33 101 138 146 198 327 343 353 430 444 537 542 612 703 799 806 820 824 835 851 852 864 937 1029 1060 1061 1082 1092 1110 1171 1334 1420 1469 1516 1564 1678 1760 1810 1903 1908 1939 2078 2084 2136 2166 2267 2386 2406 2442 2476 2551 2730 2735 2745 2776 2792 2810 2893 2895 3180 3328 3345 3390 3413 3452 3481 3569 3581 3699 3787 3795 3935 4033 4136 4241 4351 4384 4501 4524 4615 4622 4624 4625 4633 4681 4707 4724 4835 5001 5023 5132 5163 5215 5238 5260 5419 5551 5641 5673 5807 5922 6127 6136 6144 6182 6327 6407 6813 6838 6845 6960 7044 7084 7092 7106 7116 7158 7168 7397 7406 7418 7423 7433 7444 7445 7456 7463 7470 7474 7488 7494 7498 7505 7506 7513 7525 7526 7533 7534 7538 7546 7547 7554 7564 7570 7576 7577 7591 7601 7602 7606 7619 7626 7635 7642 7646 7651 7652 7657 7665 7668 7692 7708 7720 7733 7747 7754 7768 7771 7778 7781 7800
